sentences.english: The carton is blue and white, small, and made of cardboard.
sentences.chinese: 紙箱子是藍白的，很小，是製版做成。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese woodblock printing was first engraved or overlaid on wood and then printed on paper.
sentences.chinese: 傳統中國版畫，是通過刻版或製版印刷而得。

sentences.english: They began to use resin version or laser engraving to ethan.
sentences.chinese: 他們開始使用樹脂版或者用激光雕刻來製版。

sentences.english: Then, we visit the expert printmaker who made this work of art.
sentences.chinese: 然後，我們將要採訪製造這件藝術品的製版專家。

sentences.english: Microfilms can be used in projection plate-making systems.
sentences.chinese: 微攝菲林可以用於投影製版系統上。

sentences.english: The imagesetter has been largely superseded by the platesetter.
sentences.chinese: 照排機已基本被取代製版機。

sentences.english: He learned to plate expertly while still a boy.
sentences.chinese: 當他還是孩子的時候，就學會了如何製版。

sentences.english: This article specifies the plate- making process of photo-resin plate and its usage.
sentences.chinese: 簡述了移印感光樹脂版的製版工藝及使用。

sentences.english: The notes are printed using the intaglio and typographic printing processes.
sentences.chinese: 這種假幣使用了雕刻製版和凹印技術。

sentences.english: They come to him with an original image they have created.
sentences.chinese: 他們會帶着自己設計的原始圖來請他製版。

definition: to make more of the same thing/to reproduce/to reprocess/to remanufacture

pinyin: dian4 nao3 fu3 zhu4 she4 ji4
